=== Ecumenism ===
 
=== Ecumenism ===
    −
The [[ecumenical movement]] had begun to unite Catholic and Protestant thinkers but eventually grew to include first Jewish, then Islamic, then every other tradition. The [[Parliament of World Religions]] seek what it calls a "[[Global Ethic]]" which would incorporate the best analytic, social and religious norms into a single expression of [[goodness]] which can be agreed by all peoples.
+
The [[ecumenism|ecumenical movement]] had begun to unite Catholic and Protestant thinkers but eventually grew to include first Jewish, then Islamic, then every other tradition. The [[Parliament of World Religions]] seek what it calls a "[[Global Ethic]]" which would incorporate the best analytic, social and religious norms into a single expression of [[goodness]] which can be agreed by all peoples.
